entry.title: I am here
entry.content:
We could learn a lot from crayons: some are sharp, some are pretty, some are dull, while others bright, some have weird names, but they have all learned to live in the same box.

Finally I got my new blogging engine ghost up and running. I pretended to have a more dramatic blog entry as my first one, but to be honest I am so excited about having this thing working and running after I have put in so much effort into it the last couple of days that I just needed to get something out.

Anyhow, in the (hopefully near) future I will post my ideas and thoughts about many software related (and unrelated) things...

Wish me luck!

E!
